5.18.19  5:34 am   i've been awake for going on two days and i feel like absolute garbage but i CANNOT SLEEP..........i've tried going for walks, a hot shower, etc. i don't drink or smoke pot so can't do that. ii'm Seriously close to just knocking on my neighbours' doors asking them to punch me in the head so i can finally pass out. i am so desperate to just sleep and idk why i friggin can't.
i'm running out of ideas. you got any ideas?

The worst thing is that i'm sure that people will get angry with me if they notice that I don't follow them back. Do you have any suggestions? Thank you for your time Bill, this means a lot to me.
